snippet.title: DROD: The Second Sky Trailer
snippet.description:
Up-vote DROD:TSS on Steam Greenlight!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=93828972

The climactic conclusion to Beethro Budkin's epic adventures in the Great Beneath is upon us! Guide Beethro as he races against time and mysterious forces in the Rooted Empire as the dire Grand Event looms near.

This is the puzzle game to end all puzzle games.
